brand_identity.name: Aether Index
brand_identity.visual_theme: Dark Futuristic with Neon Accents (Cyberpunk x Enterprise)

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and major feature names.

code.usage: Code snippets, terminal views, technical stats.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(59,130,246,0.3)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-lg px-8 py-3 font-medium
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 hover:bg-white/10 text-white backdrop-blur-sm transition-all duration-300 rounded-lg px-8 py-3

cards.classes: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-xl overflow-hidden hover:border-white/20 transition-all duration-300 group relative

badges.classes: px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-primary/10 text-primary border border-primary/20

inputs.classes: bg-black/50 border-white/10 focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 rounded-lg

gradients.text_gradient: bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-white via-white to-zinc-500

effects.noise: url('/noise.png') opacity-5 fixed inset-0 pointer-events-none z-50 mix-blend-overlay

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME: Enforce 'dark' class on the HTML element. No light mode toggle.
2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
3. HERO: Use 'tsparticles' to create a moving network of nodes and lines in the hero background (color: #3B82F6, opacity: 0.5).
4. BORDERS: Never use a solid grey border. Use 'border-white/10' or 'border-white/5' for subtle separation.
5. GRID: Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the Resources/Repositories section. Vary card sizes (span-1 vs span-2).
6. LISTS: For lists of tools/books, use a dense layout with small icons and clean typography. Avoid bulky cards for simple list items.
7. GRADIENTS: Use the 'brand_gradient' only for key accents (buttons, active states, text highlights). Do not use it for full backgrounds.
8. SHADCN: When using shadcn components, override their default 'bg-background' with 'bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-md' to maintain the glass feel.
9. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
10. COMMUNITY: For the Discord section, use a 'glow' effect around the card to make it pop.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
